video_prompt: A radiant, concentric golden vortex pulses and spins with energetic light. Intricate golden threads, composed of tiny beads, continuously spiral outwards, weaving and crisscrossing dynamically. Spherical, reflective orbs gently drift and float through the vast, dark environment. Ethereal wisps of smoke and mist constantly undulate and swirl around the central vortex. The emanating golden light dynamically shifts and casts highlights, revealing subtle alterations in the textured, dark background structures as it moves.
image_prompt: A mesmerizing abstract cosmic scene, characterized by a striking contrast of deep dark tones and brilliant golden light. At the center, a radiant golden vortex portal with concentric glowing rings emits intense warm light and sparkling particles, creating a halo. Intricate golden beaded threads and chains spiral outwards, weaving and crisscrossing to create depth and movement. Countless lustrous, spherical pearl-like orbs, varying in size, float and reflect the golden light. The deep dark background features rugged, abstract architectural/mechanical structures with subtle golden reflections. Ethereal wisps of smoke add mystery. Dramatic golden lighting casts strong highlights and deep shadows, conveying wonder and elegance.
refined_video_prompt: A golden vortex continuously pulses and spins, radiating energetic, shifting light. Intricate golden threads perpetually spiral outwards, weaving and dynamically crisscrossing. Reflective orbs gently drift and float through the environment. Ethereal wisps of smoke and mist constantly undulate and swirl around the central vortex. The emanating golden light dynamically shifts, casting highlights that reveal subtle alterations in the dark background structures as it moves.
